title: Madagascar
short_plot_summary: A group of animals from the New York City zoo find themselves stranded on the Island of Madagascar and must adapt to the wild environment.
explanation: A lion, representing Alex the lion who is one of the main characters
A zebra, symbolizing Marty the zebra who is one of the main characters
A giraffe, illustrating Melman the giraffe who is one of the main characters
A palm tree, signifying the setting in Madagascar after they get stranded on the island
A ship, representing the boat that the animals accidentally end up on which takes them to Madagascar
